title: A Choreographer Who Merges Art, Activism and the Natural World
description: Emily Johnson’s “Being Future Being” unfolds in two parts, one at East River Park, the other at New York Live Arts.
dc:creator: Siobhan Burke
media:credit: Caitlin Ochs for The New York Times
media:description: Emily Johnson at the second part of “Being Future Being.” What if, she asked through her megaphone, “every one of us turned every one of our cells toward justice?”
